segments.text: I glance at this kitchen scene and freeze.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on, and water is overflowing everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, totally clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the boy on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up to the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tipping back; oh my gosh!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, reaching for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both so focused on the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is sunny and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, accidents are about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in a simple drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes wait innocently by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR
